name: LiquidityProtectionStats
description: This contract aggregates the statistics of the liquidity protection mechanism.

eventDecorators.name: RoleAdminChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

eventDecorators.name: RoleGranted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

eventDecorators.name: RoleRevoked
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new WPC speed is calculated for a market.

functionDecorators.name: addProviderPool
functionDecorators.description: adds a pool to the list of pools of a liquidity provider can only be executed only by an owner.

functionDecorators.name: decreaseTotalAmounts
functionDecorators.description: decreases the total amounts can only be executed only by an owner.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleMember
functionDecorators.description: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleMemberCount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

functionDecorators.name: grantRole
functionDecorators.description: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: increaseTotalAmounts
functionDecorators.description: increases the total amounts can only be executed only by an owner.

functionDecorators.name: providerPools
functionDecorators.description: returns the list of pools of a liquidity provider.

functionDecorators.name: removeProviderPool
functionDecorators.description: removes a pool from the list of pools of a liquidity provider can only be executed only by an owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

functionDecorators.name: revokeRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: seedPoolAmounts
functionDecorators.description: seeds the total amount of protected pool tokens can only be executed only by a seeder.

functionDecorators.name: seedProviderAmounts
functionDecorators.description: seeds the total amount of protected reserve tokens per liquidity provider can only be executed only by a seeder.

functionDecorators.name: seedProviderPools
functionDecorators.description: seeds the list of pools per liquidity provider can only be executed only by a seeder.

functionDecorators.name: seedReserveAmounts
functionDecorators.description: seeds the total amount of protected reserve tokens can only be executed only by a seeder.

functionDecorators.name: totalPoolAmount
functionDecorators.description: returns the total amount of protected pool tokens.

returnDecorators.description: total amount of protected pool tokens.

functionDecorators.name: totalProviderAmount
functionDecorators.description: returns the total amount of a liquidity provider's protected reserve tokens.

returnDecorators.description: total amount of the liquidity provider's protected reserve tokens.

functionDecorators.name: totalReserveAmount
functionDecorators.description: returns the total amount of protected reserve tokens.

returnDecorators.description: total amount of protected reserve tokens.
